  • @rollup/plugin-babel (⭐3.7k) - Compile your files with Babel.
  • @rollup/plugin-buble (⭐3.7k) - Compile ES2015 with buble.
  • @rollup/plugin-data-uri (⭐3.7k) - Import modules from Data URIs.
  • @rollup/plugin-html (⭐3.7k) - Create HTML files to serve Rollup bundles.
  • @rollup/plugin-node-resolve (⭐3.7k) - Locate and bundle third-party dependencies in node_modules.
  • @rollup/plugin-sucrase (⭐3.7k) - Compile TypeScript, Flow, JSX, etc with Sucrase.
  • @rollup/plugin-wasm (⭐3.7k) - Import WebAssembly code with Rollup.
  • @rollup/plugin-url (⭐3.7k) - Import files as data-URIs or ES Modules.

Rollup Plugins / Compatible with Vite

  • @rollup/plugin-legacy (⭐3.7k) - Add export declarations to legacy non-module scripts.
  • @rollup/plugin-yaml (⭐3.7k) - Convert YAML files to ES6 modules.
